korean: 특별히 살 건 없지만 그냥 구경하러 나왔다.
날씨도 좋고 기분도 안 좋아서 밖에 나가고 싶었어.
이것저것 보면서 눈으로 쇼핑하는 재미가 쏠쏠했어.
옷 가게도 들어가 보고, 악세서리 가게도 들어가 보고 그랬어.
돈을 아껴야 해서 참는 게 현명한 선택이야.
카페에 들러서 커피도 한 잔 마셨어.
가끔은 이렇게 보기만 하는 것도 나쁘지 않네.
나중에 돈 모아서 진짜 사고 싶은 거 사야지.
그래도 오늘 하루 기분이 좋아졌으니까 성공이야.
english: I didn't have anything specific to buy, but I went out just to browse.
The weather was nice and I was feeling a bit down, so I wanted to go outside.
It was fun to window shop and look at various things.
I went into clothing stores and accessory stores and looked around.
There were a lot of things I wanted to buy, but I held back.
I need to save money, so restraining myself is the smart choice.
But just trying things on is free, you know.
My wallet stayed thin, but I definitely got a change of mood.
I stopped by a cafe and had a cup of coffee too.
I enjoyed some leisure time while people-watching.
Sometimes just looking like this isn't bad at all.
Later when I save up money, I'll buy what I really want.
Until then, I'll just window shop like this.
But I feel better today, so it's actually a success.
